name.ja: <ruby>月<rt>げつ</rt></ruby><ruby>朧<rt>ろう</rt></ruby><ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>ヴァグナワ

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can make this card gain ATK equal to the total Levels of the non-Tuners used as its material x 300 (until the end of the next turn), then inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Level of the Tuner used as its material x 300. You can only use this effect of "Moonhaze Dragon Vagnawa" once per turn.
